conbody.p: Relation type questions require students to match items from two lists to each other.
These types of question will be presented to the students as shown in .

When Relations is selected as the question type, the Answers panel will include a list of matched pairs on the left and Add and Delete buttons on the right. Use these buttons to add or remove items to the list.
Click on the fields in List A and List B columns to enter or edit the text.
